definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: Consider the search “how to tie a bowtie”.
sentences.chinese: 想想“如何打领结”这个搜索。

sentences.english: More than a few of us do not know the difference between black-tie or white-tie events.
sentences.chinese: 但很多人却不知着黑领结或白领结盛会的不同之处。

sentences.english: Bow-tied waiters would deliver the first course.
sentences.chinese: 打着领结的侍者们将端上第一道菜。

sentences.english: She makes bow ties manually in the evening to sell at her own brand store, Winz.
sentences.chinese: 她晚上会做一些手工领结拿到自己的品牌专卖店卖。

sentences.english: The suggestive sheerness of this shirt is juxtaposed with an androgynous bow tie and a bright printed skirt.
sentences.chinese: 这件透视衬衫搭配中性领结和亮色印花裙，效果很好。

sentences.english: She was as usual disentangling her eyeglasses, which had got caught in her lace tie.
sentences.chinese: 她像往常一样把挂在她花边领结里的眼镜解下来。

sentences.english: Robbie went to pick up the clip-on bow ties.
sentences.chinese: 而且他们有许多夹上去的领结。

sentences.english: The collar was a high band with a white cotton sash tied in a big flamboyant bow at the neck.
sentences.chinese: 圆领，白色纯棉领巾在脖子处打成一个华丽的大领结。

sentences.english: I have always worn a clip-on bow tie.
sentences.chinese: 我都是用夹上去的领结。

sentences.english: He bought a necktie to match his new dress.
sentences.chinese: 他买了个领结来配他的新衣服。

sentences.english: We all need one of those.
sentences.chinese: 我们都需要一个这样的领结。

sentences.english: I have always worn a clip-on bow tie.
sentences.chinese: 我都是用夹上去的的领结。

sentences.english: At Christmas he found time to have a cup or two of holiday cheer and don his holly-shaped bow tie.
sentences.chinese: 到圣诞节，他会抽时间喝几杯酒，打好蝶形领结。

sentences.english: never wears a bow-tie with a button-down shirt.
sentences.chinese: 穿带衣领扣的衬衫时从不打蝶形领结。

sentences.english: And they have lots of clip-on bow ties.
sentences.chinese: 而且他们有许多夹上去的领结。

sentences.english: Many charity events or fundraisers are black tie affairs.
sentences.chinese: 许多筹款慈善晚会成为黑领结嘉宾集会。

definition: collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
